title: New Planet: Cherry's Litterbox
text:
You have discovered a new planet with Feline smells. They greet you with meows. 
 What do you do?

possibleOutcomes.text:
They were super weak and peaceful bunch. 
 They had no chance, but some credits got destroyed.

title: New Planet: Asuka's Kingdom
text:
You have arrived at a new planet where Asuka gives you some wet greetings. He is full of love. 
 What do you do?
